sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useMemo, useState } from "react" import { Box, Typography, Chip } from "@mui/material" import "./AboutUs.css" import photo1 from "../../assets/HVACCC.jpg" import photo3 from "../../assets/photo_2025-07-09_06-17-58.jpg" import photo6 from "../../assets/Cooling_services.jpg" import photo7 from "../../assets/About_us_photo.jpg" import photo8 from "../../assets/About-us_photo1.jpg" import photo9 from "../../assets/About-us_photo2.jpg" export default function AboutUs() { const [isMobile, setIsMobile] = useState(false) useEffect(() => { const onResize = () => setIsMobile(window.innerWidth <= 768) onResize() window.addEventListener("resize", onResize) return () => window.removeEventListener("resize", onResize) }, []) const images = useMemo( () => [ { src: photo1, alt: "AirFix work 1", sizeClass: "large" }, { src: photo3, alt: "AirFix work 2", sizeClass: isMobile ? "large" : "medium" }, { src: photo6, alt: "AirFix work 3", sizeClass: "large" }, { src: photo7, alt: "AirFix work 4", sizeClass: "large" }, { src: photo8, alt: "AirFix work 5", sizeClass: "large" }, { src: photo9, alt: "AirFix work 6", sizeClass: isMobile ? "large" : "medium" }, ], [isMobile] ) return ( About AirFix{" "} Heating &{" "} Cooling At AirFix Heating & Cooling, your comfort is our priority. We are a locally owned and operated company providing professional heating, cooling, and appliance repair services for homes and small businesses.

From new HVAC system installations and routine maintenance to same-day emergency repairs, our experienced technicians are ready to help. We service all major brands and use quality parts to ensure long-lasting, reliable results.

Our team is fully licensed, insured, and EPA-certified, with a strong focus on honest recommendations and upfront pricing. No shortcuts, no hidden fees, just dependable service you can trust.

Whether it is the heat of summer or the cold of winter, AirFix is here to keep your home comfortable, efficient, and running smoothly all year round. {images.map((x, idx) => ( ))} ) }
